mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (pay_id, customer_id, checkin, checkout, room_id) VALUES (reservation_seq.nextval, #{customerId}, #{checkin}, #{checkout}, #{roomId})
mapper.select: SELECT r.PAY_ID, r.CUSTOMER_ID, TO_CHAR(r.CHECKIN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECKIN_DATE, TO_CHAR(r.CHECKOUT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECKOUT_DATE, ro.ROOM_NAME FROM reservation r JOIN room ro ON r.ROOM_ID = ro.ROOM_ID
